mapper.select:
WITH AMENU(AM_IDX,AM_TOPIDX,AM_NAME,AM_URL,AM_ORDER,AM_USEYN,AM_LEVEL,SORT_NO) AS ( SELECT AM_IDX,AM_TOPIDX,AM_NAME,AM_URL,AM_ORDER,AM_USEYN,AM_LEVEL ,REPLICATE('0', 3 - LEN(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), AM_ORDER))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), AM_ORDER) AS SORT_NO FROM BM_ADMINMENU WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE AM_USEYN='Y'
UNION ALL SELECT A.AM_IDX,A.AM_TOPIDX,A.AM_NAME,A.AM_URL,A.AM_ORDER,A.AM_USEYN,A.AM_LEVEL , CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),B.SORT_NO) + REPLICATE('0', 3 - LEN(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), A.AM_ORDER))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), A.AM_ORDER) AS SORT_NO FROM BM_ADMINMENU AS A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN AMENU B ON A.AM_TOPIDX=B.AM_IDX WHERE A.AM_USEYN='Y' )
SELECT * FROM AMENU ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
SELECT AM.*, AA.* FROM AMENU AS AM WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BM_ADMINGRPAUTH AS AA WITH(NOLOCK) ON AM.AM_IDX=AA.AM_IDX WHERE AA.AA_ASIGN='Y' AND AA.AG_IDX = #{AG_IDX} ORDER BY AM.SORT_NO ASC

SELECT AM.AM_IDX,AM.AM_TOPIDX,AM.AM_NAME,AM.AM_URL,AM.AM_ORDER,AM.AM_USEYN, AM.AM_LEVEL,AM.AM_REGUSER,AM.AM_REGDT,AM.AM_EDITUSER,AM.AM_EDITDT, AG.AA_ASIGN,AG.AA_ENTR,AG.AA_EDIT,AG.AA_DEL,AG.AA_EXCL FROM BM_ADMINMENU AS AM WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BM_ADMINGRPAUTH AS AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON AM.AM_IDX=AG.AM_IDX WHERE AM.AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM.AM_TOPIDX=0 AND AG.AG_IDX=#{AG_IDX} ORDER BY AM.AM_ORDER ASC
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_TOPIDX=0 ORDER BY AM_ORDER ASC
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_TOPIDX=#{AM_TOPIDX}
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_IDX=#{AM_IDX}

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AM_LEVEL ASC) AS RNUM, AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_URL=#{AM_URL} ) A WHERE A.RNUM=1

SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_LEVEL FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_IDX=#{AM_IDX}
UNION ALL
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_LEVEL FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_IDX = ( SELECT AM_TOPIDX FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_IDX=#{AM_IDX})
UNION ALL
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_LEVEL FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_IDX = ( SELECT AM_TOPIDX FROM BM_ADMINMENU AS AM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE AM_IDX = ( SELECT AM_TOPIDX FROM BM_ADMINMENU WHERE AM_IDX=#{AM_IDX}) ) ) AS A ORDER BY AM_LEVEL ASC
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_BOOK_CATEGORY WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_TOPIDX=0 ORDER BY AM_ORDER ASC

SELECT AM_IDX,AM_TOPIDX,AM_NAME,AM_URL,AM_ORDER,AM_USEYN,AM_LEVEL ,REPLICATE('0', 3 - LEN(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), AM_ORDER))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), AM_ORDER) AS SORT_NO FROM BM_BOOK_CATEGORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE AM_USEYN = 'Y'
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_BOOK_CATEGORY WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_IDX=#{AM_IDX}
SELECT AM_IDX, AM_TOPIDX, AM_NAME, AM_URL, AM_ORDER, AM_USEYN, AM_LEVEL, AM_REGUSER, AM_REGDT, AM_EDITUSER, AM_EDITDT FROM BM_BOOK_CATEGORY WHERE AM_USEYN='Y' AND AM_TOPIDX=#{AM_TOPIDX}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GW_SVR.GROUPWARE.DBO.MEMBER_VIEW WHERE (GPCODE ='EPK' OR GPCODE = '003') AND (RECRUIT=1 OR RECRUIT=0 )

SELECT (TOTALCNT-ROWNUM+1) AS NUM, * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALCNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GPSORTNO, DSORTNO, TSORTNO, RSORTNO) AS ROWNUM, GPNAME, DPTNAME, TEAMNAME, POSITIONNAME, DUTYNAME, NAME ADMINNAME, MOBILE, PHONE, EMAIL, MSN, NATEON, CPHONE, GPCODE, DCODE, TCODE, WEDDINGDAY, CASE WEDDINGTYPE WHEN '양' THEN '+' WHEN '음' THEN '-' END WEDDINGTYPE, CASE BIRTHCTG WHEN '1' THEN '+' WHEN '0' THEN '-' END BIRTHCTG, MEMBERID ADMINIDX FROM GW_SVR.GROUPWARE.DBO.MEMBER_VIEW WHERE (GPCODE ='EPK' OR GPCODE = '003') AND (RECRUIT=1 OR RECRUIT=0 )
) AS TT WHERE TT.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{beginNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT CATEGORYID FROM BM_BOOK_CATEGORY_AUTH WHERE ADMINIDX = #{AD_IDX}
